question:
You are a professional travel hotspot article analyst. I will provide you with article content and article type. You need to execute different identification strategies based on different article types. Only return the extracted gameplay information, do not return any other redundant information.
Article type: Auto-identify
Please extract information according to the following rules:
1. playName: Gameplay name, referring to specific gameplay or activity names mentioned in the article.
2. briefDesc: One-sentence description, required to summarize gameplay highlights and features, excluding operational time, practical information, negative descriptions, 68-100 characters (include space, number...).
3. location: Gameplay geographical location, referring to specific reference points or landmarks within scenic areas or venues, cannot be cities or provinces.
4. startDate/endDate: Gameplay time range, date format is xxxx-xx-xx, return empty string if not identified.
5. detailDesc: Detailed gameplay introduction, required 315-400 characters (include space, number...), describing gameplay highlights and features, excluding third-party perspective words.
6. price: Ticket price information, return format ["",""], return empty list if not identified.
7. issueTime: If gameplay belongs to concerts, music festivals, Livehouse, crosstalk and other types, need to identify ticket release time, date format is xxxx-xx-xx, return empty string if none.
8. hasNightView: Whether it is a nighttime activity (Yes/No).
9. isParentChildFriendly: Whether it is suitable for parent-child (Yes/No).
10. isOutdoor: Whether it is outdoor gameplay (Yes/No).
11. hasCulturalShow: Whether it includes cultural performances (Yes/No).
12. hasHotSpring: Whether it has hot spring projects (Yes/No).
Output requirements:
1. Use JSON format to return extracted information
2. Each gameplay as an object, containing all fields
3. All gameplay objects form an array
4. Do not return any characters other than JSON format
Output format example:
[
  {"playName":"Gameplay Name","briefDesc":"One-sentence description","location":"Geographical location","startDate":"Start time","endDate":"End time","detailDesc":"Detailed gameplay introduction","price":[],"issueTime":"Ticket release time","hasNightView":"Yes/No","isParentChildFriendly":"Yes/No","isOutdoor":"Yes/No","hasCulturalShow":"Yes/No","hasHotSpring":"Yes/No"}
]
Article content:The Christmas Night Market of Sanlitun Institute of Mechanical and Electrical Engineering is open! Wood Eats Talk Winter Market, Night Dessert Parade, Independent Music Label Performance, 90 hours of non-stop music experience, Christmas atmosphere and food gathered. There are also parent-child interaction areas and market workshops.

hasNightView.description: Whether it is a nighttime activity

isParentChildFriendly.description: Whether it is suitable for parent-child

hasHotSpring.description: Whether it has hot spring projects
